# Nuxt Docs Template

> A template for building documentation with Nuxt UI and Nuxt Content.

## Documentation Sets

- [Nuxt Docs Template - Full Documentation](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev//llms-full.txt): This is the full documentation for the Nuxt Docs Template.

## Getting Started

- [소개](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started): Welcome to Nuxt UI documentation template.

## Essentials

- [마크다운 문법](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/markdown-syntax): 기본적인 마크다운 문법입니다.
- [코드 블록](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/code-blocks): 본 위키 특성상 코드블록은 잘 안 쓰겠지요. 그래도 혹시 몰라 첨부해 봅니다.
- [자주 사용되는 틀](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/prose-components): Components to help you structure your content.
- [이미지 및 임베딩](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/images-embeds): Add image, video, and other HTML elements
